LanguageData.VRE_DraincasketSickness.label: Thirstcasket Sickness
LanguageData.VRE_DraincasketSickness.description: After-effects of using a thirstcasket. Symptoms of thirstcasket sickness typically include localized pain, swelling, and redness at the site of the thirstcasket tubes' connection. Victims may experience increasing fatigue, weakness, and a general feeling of malaise.
